messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: BOSTON POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION BRANCH
Fraud Unit
SIGNAL: 39F
ITEM NUMBER: F-39012-16
PAGE 6 of 36
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Steven Harris
Sgt. Karen White
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Lisa Green
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Paul Johnson
Sgt. Rachel Adams
( Economic Crimes Unit)
Det. Michael Brown
Det. Emily Clarke
( Economic Crimes Unit)
Det. Ryan Peterson
( Economic Crimes Unit)
Det. Laura Evans
Det. Jason Lee
(General Assignment)
Det. Anna Ramirez
(Identity Theft Section)
Det. Kevin Martin
(Financial Crimes Section)
VICTIM:
JANE DOE, female, date of birth 08/04/1984.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
04 APRIL 2016 at around 3:30 PM in the Downtown Crossing area.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Lisa Green
3232
The investigation, fraught with complex financial trails and deceptive testimonies, was challenging. Officer Williams, routinely monitoring the area, was among the first to report suspicious activities. Assisted by Sgt. Paul Johnson and Patrol Officer Simmons, they established a secure zone for further examination. Technician Murphy, with expertise in financial forensics, was brought in to scrutinize the convoluted financial documents. Criminalist Johnson, focusing on the detailed evidence, identified a pattern of fraud that was pivotal in the case. Coroner Dr. Thompson was later involved to examine a deceased individual found in proximity, originally deemed unrelated but later proving to be a key element in the fraud investigation. Patrol Officer Gibson, working closely with the business community, managed to uncover information that led to a series of arrests.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Steven Harris Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Fraud Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Karen White Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Harris. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Lisa Green Officer Context: Lead investigator for the fraud case, also the reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Paul Johnson Officer Context: Assisted in the initial response, affiliated with the Economic Crimes Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Rachel Adams Officer Context: Economic Crimes Unit sergeant, supported the investigation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Michael Brown Officer Context: Economic Crimes Unit detective, contributed to the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Emily Clarke Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Economic Crimes Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Ryan Peterson Officer Context: Economic Crimes Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Laura Evans Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Jason Lee Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the fraud case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Anna Ramirez Officer Context: Identity Theft Section detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Kevin Martin Officer Context: Financial Crimes Section detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Williams Officer Context: First to report suspicious activities in the Downtown Crossing area. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Simmons Officer Context: Assisted in establishing a secure zone for investigation. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Murphy Officer Context: Specialized in financial forensics, scrutinized financial documents. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Johnson Officer Context: Identified a pattern of fraud in the evidence. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Thompson Officer Context: Examined a deceased individual linked to the fraud case. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Gibson Officer Context: Uncovered information leading to arrests, worked with the business community. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
